abstract: After a $78 million restoration the Kiel Opera House reopened on Oct. 1 as the Peabody Opera House.
snippet: After a $78 million restoration the Kiel Opera House reopened on Oct. 1 as the Peabody Opera House.
lead_paragraph: The lights at the Kiel Opera House in St. Louis went dark after a philharmonic performance in 1991. Unused for years, the theater reopened on Oct. 1 as the Peabody Opera House, after undergoing a $78 million restoration that began in July 2010.

headline.main: Opera House Lights Shine Again in St. Louis
